en.title: Attack on Blob: Mega Multiply
en.lesson1_intro_1: Multiplying a number of two or more digits can be tricky, but there’s a special trick to make it easier!
en.lesson1_intro_2: Let’s take a quick look at a math concept that we will be using for this trick.
en.lesson1_distribute_1: By using the distributive property, we can split up the large number of an equation into smaller pieces.
en.lesson1_area_1: To help visualize this, we will consider these smaller pieces as chunks of a rectangle’s area.
en.lesson1_area_2: As you can see, the rectangle is split into two.
en.lesson1_area_3: Then we compute the area of those two rectangles.
en.lesson1_area_4: And finally, we add these two areas together to get the area of the whole rectangle.
en.lesson1_connect_1: Let’s give it a try. Connect these two blobs to initiate the attack!
